items.name: Double Strata Fog DIPA
items.desc:
A DIPA showcasing one of our favourite new hops; Strata! Pale Malt, Dextrose, Chit & Oats make up the grist for a soft malt profile.
Whirpool and dry hop additions of Strata bring out its characteristic citrus and dank aromas backed up by flavours of tropical fruit.

items.name: Galaxy Fog IPA
items.desc: An IPA showcasing one of our favourite hops; Galaxy! Super pale & chit make up the grist, whilst the Galaxy hops bring their characteristic Passion fruit and peach to meld with the peachy esters from our house yeast.

items.name: Gardens Of Green IPA
items.desc: Gardens of Green is a dual hop IPA series, tailoring recipe and process to best express each hop combination. Weâ€™ve paired Enigma & Moutere to create an IPA bursting with white grape, resin & passion fruit.

items.name: Pintle Pale Ale
items.desc: Pintle is our core pale pale ale, brewed with wheat, oats and flaked barley in the grist for a smooth body; Whirlpooled & dry hopped with both Australian Cascade and Citra, its restrained bitterness and dry finish help maintain Pintle's all day crushability
